thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 5 of 925
thread.title: Ace

author: Ace
title: Ace
text: There are a lot of good bundles offered. The main page do show the AAA titles bundle. But I really do love if there are option to view other non-AAA titles bundle. The payment or transaction is smooth. I hope the payment option could be improved by giving more ways to pay since the lack of payment option can make it a little bit hard to pay for certain people. The UI is good but it is not easy to view each bundles. I hope you can improved on the way to show the contents of the each bundles without having to constantly refreshing or switch pages. The method of conveying info or description of each game after refreshing to the page of that bundle is great.
